title: Add Zoho CRM dedup check at export time
description: VSDP cross-references every lead against Zoho CRM Deals before export — marks leads already in CRM and adds the Zoho record URL to Import Notes. HADES has export_dedup.py for cross-session dedup but no CRM check. Add Zoho matching at export time to prevent pushing duplicates already being worked in CRM. Reference: VSDP/vanillasoft_automation.py lines 762-874.
